trans-unit.source: Represents a single item of data extracted from a workflow and all its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: Representa um único item de dados extraídos de um fluxo de trabalho e todas as suas anotações associadas.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução corresponde a um ponto de controle, ele envia um registro de controle para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> may contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects that specify data to be extracted from the workflow and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> pode conter <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos que especificam os dados a ser extraído do fluxo de trabalho e retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> represents a single item of this extracted data in either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> representa um único item desses dados extraídos de uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the list of annotations associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a lista de anotações associadas com os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> that contains the annotations associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> que contém as anotações associadas com os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> can specify annotations to be sent with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> pode especificar as anotações para ser enviada com os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: These are contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A> property.
Gets or sets the extracted data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados extraídos associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Data%2A> contains the member data, specified by an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, that was extracted from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Data%2A> contém os dados de membro especificados por uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, que foi extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the property or field associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da propriedade ou campo associado com os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the property or field that was extracted.
trans-unit.target: O ponto delineadas nome da propriedade ou campo que foi extraído.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure supports data extraction on fields and properties of classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>; a member of such a field or property; and a single item of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, for example a single element in a collection.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução oferece suporte a extração de dados em campos e propriedades de classes que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>; um membro de tal campo ou propriedade; e um único item de um campo ou uma propriedade (ou um membro da) que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, por exemplo um único elemento em uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A> contains the dot delineated name of the item extracted and is equivalent to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> depending on which type of extract specified the data contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A> contém o nome de ponto delineado do item extraído e é equivalente a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> dependendo do tipo de extração especificado os dados contidos pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.
